overview: Russ Whitney’s story is proof, which includes dropping out of high school … barely earning enough money to pay his bills while working in a slaughter house … to becoming a millionaire in just a few short years … building the largest educational training company of it’s kind in the world … enduring a 2-year government investigation that cost him over $20 million in legal fees – and winning the biggest battle of his professional career … and now Russ is re-building his real estate training empire with a new appreciation for life and wealth. His new system, called the INNER VOICE Alliance, is a testament to what anyone can achieve.
